tasks.label: Sync, Install, and Build All
tasks.command: git pull; npm install; cd frontend; npm install; npm run build; cd ../frontend-new; npm install; npm run build; cd ../services/copilot-engine; npm install; npm run build; cd ../../..

tasks.label: Deploy Frontend to Azure Static Web App
tasks.command: az staticwebapp deploy --name litlabstudio-frontend --resource-group LitreeLabstudio --source frontend --output json

tasks.label: Deploy Backend to Azure App Service
Show Frontend Status
tasks.command: az staticwebapp show --name litlabstudio-frontend --resource-group LitreeLabstudio --output table

tasks.label: Show Backend Status
tasks.command: az webapp show --name litlabstudio-backend --resource-group LitreeLabstudio --output table
